hero.title: Blockchain in the School
hero.subtitle: Empowering public school students with blockchain and web3 technology
hero.paragrapho:
Our goal is to be a decentralized network of teachers and creators bringing blockchain and web3 education to public schools and social projects in Latin America. 
 
Our introductory course track takes our students on a journey from understanding the fundamentals of blockchain technology to more complex topics like consensus algorithms and hashing. 
 
Whether you are a student, teacher or educational administrator, we have the course trail to onboard you to blockchain technology.

$nos.title: $NOS
$nos.subtitle: The Social Token
$nos.paragrapho:
The name of our social token - $NOS - comes from the Brazilian expression “É noix,” which reaffirms the sense of community that links a huge portion of our youth. The term can also be easily translated into Spanish, “nosotros,” for connecting with our hermanos in Latin America. 
 
$NOS has a pedagogical use, encouraging students to learn, and acting as a tool for teachers to create dynamic interactions with web3 in the classroom.

cursos.title: Courses
cursos.subtitle: Knowledge Sharing
cursos.paragrapho:
Our course track offers everything from the basics of blockchain technology and how to safely store your assets, to more advanced knowledge of token economics and engineering. 
 
These are courses that can be completed in less than 5 minutes and provide a non-fungible token (NFT) generated by the 101.xyz platform at the end of each course. Anyone can check who owns these NFTs, making it a great way to encourage students to delve deeper into web3 topics. 
 
Here's a secret: Blockchain in the School NFTs give you access to exclusive benefits in our community.

missao.title: MISSION
missao.subtitle: Educate public school students about blockchain and the web3 to foster regenerative entrepreneurship in Latin America
missao.subtitle2: Build a support network of teachers, students and startups to decentralize the production of teaching materials and innovation in local economies

equipe.title: Team
equipe.subtitle: Our team is led by four contributors and a team of collaborators that help us with specific topics.

card_1.name: Marcelo Silva
card_1.title: Founder & Advisor
card_1.descricao: Marcelo Silva, is a researcher (PhD from UFRJ) focused on institutional analysis, enthusiast of Regenerative Finance, Community Builder at ReFi Spring, Research Officer at Impact Plus and author of courses on web3 and ReFi with more than 30,000 graduates.

card_2.name: Gregory Azevedo
card_2.title: Brand & Communication
card_2.descricao: Gregory Azevedo is a specialist in Growth Marketing, brand building and strategy, and customer behavior trends. He leads our partnerships with influencers and schools. Also leads our marketing and social media strategies.

card_3.name: Ariel Leite
card_3.title: Coordinator & Product
card_3.descricao: Ariel is an economist and product manager, but here at BnE he does a little bit of everything. He created the HUM4NT3CH course, revamped our website, is responsible for national (and international!) expansion plans, and keeps bugging other contributors on Telegram.

card_4.name: Verber Alves
card_4.title: Regional Leader
card_4.descricao: Verber is our regional program leader in Belo Horizonte, which also unites social movements through the Blcktopia initiative. He is a lawyer with experience in humanitarian crisis conflicts, cultural producer and project manager.
